name: Letter from Heck(ius), Joannes to Clusius, Carolus, 1604-02-17

Diplomatic.text:
<body>Excellens D.S.P.

 Imperantibus studiosissimus Academicus has ad te mitto litteras, vir Excell<sup>me</sup>, optans ut per eum qui fert tabellarium satisfacias petitionibus horum doctissimorum virorum, ipsasque si mihi remiseris epistolas quam diligentissime et quam citissime exhibebo.
 Vale. Romae XIII calendas martii 1604

 E.T. studiosissimus
 <ab id="9003940"/>Joannes Heckius<ae id="9003940"/>
</body>

type.description: Name of person, if possible with PE-number in BIA
type.name: Person

metadata.value: Transcription by F.W.T. Hunger. Also published in Gabrieli.
